reuters.title: <CORNUCOPIA RESOURCES LTD> IN DRILLING PROGRAM
reuters.body: Cornucopia Resources Ltd said an extensive drill and sampling program will begin in mid-April at its Ivanhoe gold property in north central Nevada. It said it will seek to increase the present reserves of eight mln short tons grading 0.045 ounce of gold per ton that had been found by USX Corp <X> on a small portion of the 13,.000 acre property, determine the location of possible high-grade ore zones at depth and test other targets.
